reviewText:
I wanted to give this 5 stars but 2 little things stopped that.
1. it does not start on its own. it has a advertisement in the beginning but then goes to the play menu and you have to hit play.
2. after it is done it does not start over by itself like many other kids dvds
Other that that it is cute and my daughter loves it
My 2yr old daughter loves this dvd. It's a really fun show and I like how it teaches her how to solve problems.

Kate and Mim-mim is a must own. I like how Kate figures out a problem with her imaginary friends that lines up with a real world problem she's trying to solve, and it's believable the way it's presented. It's not overwhelming yet keeps their attention with slightly shorter stories. I like the positive messages like friendship, problem solving, working together, helping each other and asking for help. Great addition to our collection.

My kids absolutely love this show! It's full of life, laughter, color, energy, & excitement! I have twin boys and every time Kate & Mim-Mim comes on their eyes just light up, they dance, & smile! I have to say I love it myself :-)
My 3 year old loved this show. She's 5 now and still likes to watch the DVD sometimes.
kids love this show just wish it had more episodes per dvd

This is the story of a young girl who loses touch with reality due to her neglectful parents.
Kate's parents frequently look for an opportunity to abandon her to her own vices so she frequently embarks on escapist fantasies involving her stuff rabbit. The deeper she spirals into madness the more help she needs from the color characters that litter her mind and ends up learning the life lessons that her parents need to be teaching her.
When reality returns she frequently approaches her parents with details of these fantasies, but they just smile and nod.

It also has colorful animation.
Such an amazing show with great little life lessons! We love Kate & mim mim

I got this and the package was fine the DVD case itself was fine and unopened... Yet when I opened the DVD case the DVD itself was messed up the disc was in half the illustrations on the disc one piece and the bottoms shiny part another piece ...I'd never seen this happen before .

Kate and Mim-Mim: "Flight of the Floweres". Grand Kids like Kate and Mim Mim on Disney Junior.  A new DVD release ( able to be played on US DVD players ) of several episodes seen on TV, but not previously available on DVD.  Kids love them.

My kids have never seen Kate & Mim-Mim before so this was a fun DVD for them to watch. It features six episodes starring five year old Kate and her bunny buddy Mim-Mim.  Together with their friends they go on silly adventures. The show is wholesome and teaches kids simple lessons. Very cute.

Episodes:

Flight of the Flowers
The Need for Seed
Butterfly Flowers
Small Wonders
Babysitting Squoosh
Bunch O'Boomers

I received this DVD to review in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.
One of my grandson's favorite shows, I'm sure he's enjoying it.
